alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Dixie; Franklin; Gadsden; Gulf; Jefferson; Lafayette; Leon; Liberty; Madison; Taylor; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 12 at 3:56AM EST until March 12 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 42 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 6 AM EST /5 AM CST/ EARLY THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 12 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA DIXIE FRANKLIN GADSDEN JEFFERSON LAFAYETTE LEON LIBERTY MADISON TAYLOR WAKULLA IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA CALHOUN GULF IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 22 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BEN HILL BERRIEN BROOKS COLQUITT COOK IRWIN LANIER LOWNDES THOMAS TIFT TURNER WORTH IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA BAKER CALHOUN DECATUR DOUGHERTY GRADY LEE MILLER MITCHELL SEMINOLE TERRELL THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBA, ABE SPRINGS, ADAMS BEACH, ADEL, ALBANY, ALFORDS, ALMA, APALACHICOLA, ARLINGTON, ASHBURN, ASHTON, ATHENA, AUSMAC, BABCOCK, BAINBRIDGE, BANNOCKBURN, BARNEYVILLE, BAY CITY, BEACHTON, BELLVIEW, BERRIEN CO A/P, BETHEL, BEVERLY, BLOUNTSTOWN, BLUE SPRINGS, BLUE SPRINGS, BOWENS MILL, BOYD, BOYKIN, BRADFORDVILLE, BRANCHVILLE, BROOKS CO A/P, BUCELL JUNCTION, BUCK SIDING, BUCKVILLE, CABBAGE GROVE, CAIRO, CAMILLA, CAPEL, CAPITOLA, CAPPS, CARBUR, CARRABELLE, CASA BLANCO, CHAIRES, CHAIRES CROSSROADS, CHATTAHOOCHEE, CHERRY LAKE, CHULA, CLARKS MILL, CLARKSVILLE, COLQUITT, COMMISSARY HILL, COOK CO A/P, COOKS HAMMOCK, COOKTOWN, CORDRAYS MILL, COTTLE, COTTON, COURTHOUSE, CROSS CITY, CROSS CITY AIRPORT, DALKEITH, DAVIS PARK, DAWSON, DAWSON MUNICIPAL A/P, DAY, DECATUR CO A/P, DICKEY, DILLON, DILLS, DIXIE, DONALDSONVILLE A/P, DONALSONVILLE, DOVEREL, DRIFTON, DURHAM, EAST ALBANY, EDISON, ELMODEL WMA, ELPINO, EMPRESS, ENTERPRISE, FAIRCHILD, FESTUS, FITZGERALD, FITZGERALD MUNICIPAL A/P, FORRESTER, FORT GADSDEN, FRINK, GAMMAGE, GORDY, GRADY CO A/P, GRAVES, GREGGS, GROOVERVILLE, HANOVER, HANSON, HARDIN HEIGHTS, HARDING, HAWKINSTOWN, HEROD, HILLIARDVILLE, HINES, HOBBY, HOGGARD MILL, HONEYVILLE, HOPEWELL, HOWARD CREEK, IRWINVILLE, ISABELLA, IVEYS MILL, JARROTT, JONESBORO, KILLEARN ESTATES, KILLEARN LAKES, LACONTE, LAKELAND, LEESBURG, LITTLE HOPE, LITTMAN, LOCKETT CROSSING, LOVETT, LYNN, MACLAY STATE GARDENS, MADISON, MARYSVILLE, MASSEE, MAYHAW, MAYO, METCALF, MIDWAY, MILFORD, MITCHELL CO A/P, MONCRIEF, MONTICELLO, MORGAN, MOULTRIE, MOULTRIE MUNICIPAL A/P, NANKIN, NASHVILLE, NEWTON, OAK GROVE, OCILLA, ODENA, OLD TOWN, PALMYRA, PASCO, PELHAM, PERRY, PINE PARK, PINE VALLEY, PINETTA, PORT ST. JOE, PRETORIA, QUEENSLAND, QUINCY, QUINCY AIRPORT, QUITMAN, RED ROCK, RED STORE CROSSROADS, RIVERTURN, SANTA CLARA, SCOTTS FERRY, SEMINOLE STATE PARK, SMITHVILLE, SOPCHOPPY, SOUTHWEST GA REGIONAL A/P, SPENCE AIRPORT, ST. MARKS, STEINHAM STORE, SUNSWEET, SWEETWATER, SYLVESTER, SYLVESTER AIRPORT, TALLAHASSEE, TEETERVILLE, THOMASVILLE, TIFTON, TILTON, TURNER CITY, VALDOSTA, VALDOSTA REGIONAL AIRPORT, WAKULLA SPRINGS, WALKER, WATERLOO, WEBER, WEST BAINBRIDGE, WESTWOOD, WETUMPKA, WEWAHITCHKA, WHITE CITY, WILLIAMSBURG, WORTH, YELLOW JACKET, AND YEOMANS.
